overview:
## Discussion

When you send a `SELECT` command with a [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO7816APDU/p1Parameter] value of `0x04`, your app must support one of the applications listed in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Entitlements/com.apple.developer.nfc.readersession.iso7816.select-identifiers] property list key. Otherwise, the `completionHandler` receives an [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCReaderError-swift.struct/Code/readerErrorSecurityViolation] error.

The session calls `completionHandler` on the dispatch queue that you provided when creating the [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCTagReaderSession] object.

# sendCommand(apdu:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Sends an application protocol data unit (APDU) to the tag and receives a response APDU.

## Declaration

```swift
func sendCommand(apdu: NFCISO7816APDU, completionHandler: @escaping (Data, UInt8, UInt8, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func sendCommand(apdu: NFCISO7816APDU) async throws -> (Data, UInt8, UInt8)
```

## Parameters

- **apdu**: An application protocol data unit to send to the tag.
- **completionHandler**: A handler that the reader session invokes after the operation completes. The handler has the following parameters:



## Discussion

When you send a `SELECT` command with a [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO7816APDU/p1Parameter] value of `0x04`, your app must support one of the applications listed in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Entitlements/com.apple.developer.nfc.readersession.iso7816.select-identifiers] property list key. Otherwise, the `completionHandler` receives an [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCReaderError-swift.struct/Code/readerErrorSecurityViolation] error.

The session calls `completionHandler` on the dispatch queue that you provided when creating the [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCTagReaderSession] object.

## Sending a Command

- **sendCommand(apdu:resultHandler:)**: Sends an application protocol data unit (APDU) to the tag and receives a response APDU.
- **NFCISO7816APDU**: An object representing an ISO 7816 application protocol data unit (APDU).
- **NFCISO7816ResponseAPDU**: An object containing the response from the tag.
